name: Obscure Resurrection
description:
Obscure Resurrection

Explore the dungeon as Dog.

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move.

Collect coins to increase your score.

Bork to protect yourself by pressing space bar.

You need potions to bork. Collect more to ensure you stay protected!

Get hit 3 times and it's game over!

You can view the source code for this game here.
